tasks.label: Fix Git and Push
args: taskkill /F /IM git.exe; git reset --merge; git pull origin main --allow-unrelated-histories --no-edit; git push origin main

tasks.label: Fix Git and Push PS
args: Stop-Process -Name git -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; git reset --merge; git pull origin main --allow-unrelated-histories --no-edit; git push origin main

tasks.label: Check Git Status
args: git status; git push origin main
